title: South Hams Walks

description: South Hams is a council area located on the south coast of Devon. The headquarters are located in Totnes. It's a wonderful area for coastal walking with towns including Dartmouth, Kingsbridge, Salcombe, and Ivybridge. There is also a section of the Darmoor National Park in the district. See the list below for walks in the area and the map for waymarked trails around Totnes.
display_address: Newton Road, Bridgetown, Totnes, South Hams, Devon, England, TQ9 5BB, United Kingdom
